fields.name: Haircut:
fields.value: Target a player with whom you share a Hello Neighbor. Roleblock them and deduct one fifth of your score from theirs.

fields.name: Musical Chairs (Charge 75%):
fields.value: Swap any two players with whom you share Hello Neighbors. Any non-Mafia visits targeting one will target the other.

fields.name: Small Talk (Passive):
fields.value: At the end of each evening phase, for each player with whom you shared a Hello Neighbor, you will learn a random number of facts (1 for each 20%), based on your score: their attack power, their defense power, their exact score, their alignment, or their subalignment.

fields.name: Wandering Scissors (Passive):
fields.value: Your attack power is doubled if you share a Hello Neighbor with your target.

fields.name: Patronage (Passive):
fields.value: Each day, you may request a number of hello neighbors, based on your score (0-32% = 1, 33-66% = 2, 67%+ = 3).
